name: MrCrazy
description:
In this endless jump and run game you are MrCrazy and you have to explore the world. Try to get a good score!  This is my first game . There were a lot more sounds, but I had to remove them because of copyright. There are a random level generation and some moving plattforms and enemies.

I learned creating games with the tutorials from MrLuchs.

Very important: You can only play the endless Mode. The other mode is not working, but in development. If you find some bugs, please write them into the comment section.
